thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-CdR Advance Capital Acquires Vehicle Company Owning A Property In Milan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CdR Advance Capital Acquires Vehicle Company Owning A Property In Milan
text:
Feb 1(Reuters) - CDR ADVANCE CAPITAL:
* SAID ON WEDNESDAY IT CONCLUDED VIA UNIT NON PERFORMING ASSETS THE ACQUISITION OF A VEHICLE COMPANY OWNING A PROPERTY IN MILAN
* THE OPERATION INVOLVES AN INVESTMENT OF UP EUR 1 MLN * NON PERFORMING ASSETS HAS ALSO GIVEN TO A THIRD PARTY AN OPTION FOR THE ACQUISITION OF THE VEHICLE WHICH CAN BE EXERCIZED NO LATER THAN FEB 28, 2019
* THE PRICE OF THE OPTION CAN GRANT NET PROCEEDS OF EUR 0.3 MLN
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
